title: Panasonic Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo with 11 Preset Cooking Functions, FlashXpress with Double Infrared Heating, Temperature Control Dial, PFAS Free, 1800W - NB-G211P
description: The Panasonic FlashXpress Countertop Air Fryer Toaster Oven NB-G210 is made for everyone who wants fast, healthy food, especially those with busy famiies! This Flash Xpress oven has added air frying to its already legendary performance, with fast preheating to help you get snacks and meals on the table quickly. A total of eleven cook settings (toast, airfry, bake, and more) give you all the options you need to make everything from your morning bagel to a flavorful dinner of roasted vegetables and a succulent, juicy chicken roast. Panasonic FlashXpress Countertop Air Fryer Toaster Oven NB-G210 has an attractive stainless steel exterior and easy-clean enamel interior make this appliance stand out anywhere. A double layer glass door helps keep the heat inside while preenting the door from getting too hot to the touch. It is also free from PFAS and has with eco-friendly bioderadable packaging.
